plot: A girl elopes with a bigamist who forces her to work in a tavern. She is saved by a sailor.
title: A Mad Infatuation
plot_es: A girl elopes with a bigamist who forces her to work in a tavern. She is saved by a sailor.
plot_en: A girl elopes with a bigamist who forces her to work in a tavern. She is saved by a sailor.
